replies.txt_content:
标题: [管理|汉化]MinkFreeze——冻结熊孩子吧![1.8.8] 本帖最后由 17011977 于 2016-10-2 09:18 编辑 

——介绍：这是一个可以使玩家不能动弹的插件，针对于熊孩子


——指令：/freeze 玩家ID   冻结玩家,一直到手动关闭
              /ss 玩家ID   冻结玩家,一直到手动关闭
              / FreezeReload -重新加载配置文件

             :以后再也不敢熊服了


——权限：mink.freeze.bypass  插件全部使用权限，默认op拥有


没有游戏截图，原贴也没有，这种差距截图也看不出效果

                          汉化插件下载：

http://pan.baidu.com/s/1hs0nn0o



                          原贴内容：
Commands
/freeze <Player> - Freezes the player until toggled off, this is mainly used for servers with screensharing involved to check if they are hacking. 
/ss <Player> - - Freezes the player until toggled off, this is mainly used for servers with screensharing involved to check if they are hacking. 
/FreezeReload - reloads configuration file!
Permissions
mink.freeze - Allows the player to use /freeze. mink.freeze.bypass - Allows Player to bypass /freeze, Both permissions come default when Op.


                                                             1.1更新记录：
I'm back! Added some new features.
- YOU NO LONGER NEED TO SPECIFY A REASON WHILE FROZEN! (This is still optional).
- Config.yml is currently being revamped.
- Can no longer do commands while frozen unless have the permission, Or OP.
- Please leave support below, And or known caveats.
